input.sentences: today we moved into our new house .
all the guys showed up to help | which was great .
it took some effort | but with the promise of pizza and beer they figured out how to get it inside .
a quick heave ho and they were through the door .
now it 's time for a break .
output.sentences: Robert finally bought is dream home.
He's so thankful to have family to help him move in.
They take his items up the long driveway.
With just a little difficulty, they manage to hoist the items into the home.
Everyone celebrates a job well done, feeling goofy and accomplished.
